title: Guys, I'm gonna be honest here... I've never dated anyone after highschool.
body:
To make a 4 part novel of my highschool drama life as short as possible..

I was in love with a girl (We're gonna call her Lyra (Because i like that name) ), Started flirting, Everything went fine, She was underweight (That was OK with me because i knew how to cook and said i'd help her after school, all that flirty/loveydovey stuff) and really, it seemed no one else was into her. 

It comes to about, Oh, what, 2 weeks later, At this point we're semi-officially dating (Semi-officially because we didnt update facebook and everyone was questioning everything). Lyra and I were spending time together quite often, I'd pick her up from Volleyball practice and drive her around the town for a bit before taking her home (Back when i had money from a job to waste on gas). And one night, I get this just loud thud on my bedroom desk (My room was quite a mess and i had two windows, both lit up my desk as it was in a corner) and guess fuckign what its Lyra's phone with the words "Go Fuck Yourself". (The scariest part is i live in basically the middle of fucking nowhere.. like, Everyone knows where i live because my father owns an excavation company, but its still freaky as fuck)

So next day, come to school and give her her phone, She thanks me, hugs and kisses bullshit, Then tells me that she's moving away...

Next day, See her with someone else, She pretends like i never existed and her "Partner" (Who had engineering with me btw) Basically told me to Kill myself, And tried (Several times) In engineering to stab me. 

So, Yeah. 

I havent dated anyone because chick was an asshole and got an asshole partner to go fuck themselves  in hell. (She actually commited suicide a few months later, Turns out she was a junior, had failing grades and, Guess what, Fucking pregnant with her ex's baby (Her ex before me).. No sorrow was felt)
